title: Benny Loves You
description: Jack, a man desperate to improve his life, throws away his beloved childhood plush, Benny. It’s a move that has disastrous consequences when Benny springs to life with deadly intentions!

reviews.text: Es mas ridícula y bizarra de lo que parece, tiene un sentido del humor que no me convenció mucho ya que se siente demasiado tonto e infantil, aún así, el susodicho juguete tiene su propio encanto.
Bought the doll it was so good. The premise for this movie is really unique and Benny is an incredible character. I hope to see the director and actor team up again with a bigger budget.
Wow now fun!!!! The idea of a small bear mercilessly murdering people is ridiculous. Even more so than child's play. That's what makes it so fun and dumb. One of my favorite horror films in years.
